segments.text: I see the little boy standing on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to fall any second now, and it’s terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is already tilting backward, and he’s stretching so far up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl below him, just waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re doing this right behind their mother’s back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just a few feet away, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s hand is deep in the jar, and he’s not even looking where he’s standing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is supposed to be the lookout, but she’s just as distracted by the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t take that last step backward—it’ll be a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
